repo_notes.content: This document provides a comprehensive introduction to Quick Smart Plan (QSP), an AI-powered planning application that demonstrates how browser-native AI can dynamically generate user interfaces tailored to specific user goals.

pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce Quick Smart Plan, explain its purpose as an AI-powered planning application, and provide a high-level understanding of the system architecture

page_notes.content: The application's key innovation is Prompt API LanguageModel.

pages.title: Key Concepts
pages.purpose: Explain the fundamental concepts: AI-powered UI generation, browser-native AI APIs and client-side-only design

page_notes.content: AI-powered UI generation: Uses Prompt API.

pages.title: Technology Stack
pages.purpose: Document the complete technology stack including Hugo, VanillaJS, Bootstrap, PostCSS, and browser AI APIs

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.purpose: Guide developers through setup, installation, and running the application locally

pages.title: Prerequisites and Installation
pages.purpose: Detail required tools (Node.js, Hugo, npm/pnpm) and installation steps

pages.title: Development Workflow
pages.purpose: Explain how to run the development server, make changes, and test locally

pages.title: Build System
pages.purpose: Comprehensive documentation of the Hugo-based build pipeline, asset generation, and deployment process

pages.title: Hugo Configuration
pages.purpose: Deep dive into hugo.yaml configuration including module mounts, cache busting, markup settings, and parameters

pages.title: Asset Pipeline
pages.purpose: Explain SCSS compilation, PostCSS processing, asset generation, and metadata tracking

pages.title: Cache Busting Strategy
pages.purpose: Document the content-hash-based cache busting mechanism and how asset versioning works

pages.title: Production Builds
pages.purpose: Explain production build process, minification, garbage collection, and deployment to Netlify

pages.title: Application Architecture
pages.purpose: Explain the overall application structure, coordinator pattern, and component system

pages.title: Coordinator Pattern
pages.purpose: Document the coordinator module that orchestrates application state and component lifecycle

pages.title: Application States
pages.purpose: Explain the two primary application modes: AI Generation Mode and Active Project Mode

pages.title: Component Registry
pages.purpose: Document the RENDERERS registry and how components are dynamically loaded and mounted

pages.title: Event System
pages.purpose: Explain global event handlers (app:new-plan-requested, app:select-project, app:project-created) and event-driven architecture

pages.title: AI Integration
pages.purpose: Comprehensive guide to how the application leverages browser-native AI APIs for intelligent UI generation

pages.title: Browser AI APIs
pages.purpose: Explain the LanguageModel API, availability checking, session creation, and prompt/streaming methods

pages.title: AI Generator Component
pages.purpose: Deep dive into the ai-generator.js MVC architecture, user interaction flow, and component lifecycle

pages.title: Three-Stage Generation Pipeline
pages.purpose: Document the tool selection, content generation, and metadata generation stages with prompt engineering details

pages.title: JSON Parsing and Error Recovery
pages.purpose: Explain the robust JSON parsing strategy using jsonrepair, extractJsonSnippet, and error handling for malformed LLM responses

pages.title: Streaming Responses
pages.purpose: Document streaming prompt patterns, buffering strategies, and real-time UI updates

pages.title: UI Components
pages.purpose: Overview of the modular VanillaJS component system used for project display

pages.title: AI Generator UI
pages.purpose: Document the AI generator HTML template, user interaction elements, and template system

pages.title: Component Mounting
pages.purpose: Explain how components are mounted, container assignment, and host element management

pages.title: Backdrop and Visual Feedback
pages.purpose: Document the backdrop system for showing AI processing state with animated text transitions

pages.title: Styling System
pages.purpose: Comprehensive guide to the CSS architecture, Bootstrap integration, and design token system

pages.title: CSS Architecture
pages.purpose: Explain the layered CSS architecture: design tokens, base elements, components, and utilities

pages.title: Design Tokens
pages.purpose: Document CSS custom properties (--bs-* variables) for colors, typography, spacing, and theming

pages.title: Bootstrap Integration
pages.purpose: Explain Bootstrap component usage, customization, and the comprehensive component ecosystem
